data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Jhalawar, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jhalawar, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Jhalawar, Rajasthan, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.section_summary: On average, 114 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Jhalawar, Rajasthan, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Lord, please give the 15,522 believers in the county of Jhalawar the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Jhalawar, Rajasthan, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, defend the church in the county of Jhalawar against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Jhalawar, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.section_summary:
the county of Jhalawar, Rajasthan, India has a population of 1,411,100.

We estimate Jhalawar has 15,522 people who might know Jesus, 17,121 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,378,457 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Jhalawar.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.
